CmdLine: set -x &&   apt-get update &&   DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends curl ca-certificates openssh-client libevent-2.0 libutempter0 libncurses5 zlib1g libssl1.0.0 &&   mkdir -p $TMATE_HOME/keys &&   curl -sSL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmate-io/tmate-slave/master/create_keys.sh" -o $TMATE_HOME/create_keys.sh &&   chmod 755 $TMATE_HOME/create_keys.sh &&   curl -sSL "https://circle-artifacts.com/gh/dakue/docker-tmate-slave-builder/1/artifacts/0/tmp/circle-artifacts.kTAa6Wz/tmate-slave" -o /usr/local/bin/tmate-slave &&   chmod 755 /usr/local/bin/tmate-slave &&   curl -sSL "https://circle-artifacts.com/gh/dakue/docker-tmate-slave-builder/1/artifacts/0/tmp/circle-artifacts.kTAa6Wz/tmate-slave-lib.tar.gz" |   tar xz &&   apt-get clean &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
